title: Freeze in champ select after bans
body:
Can't lock in my champ, says I dodged, now at 30m queue times.

From reading around I'm not the only one. What the hell is going on? And can someone fix this? My connection is solid.

replies.body: Already done those, still happened. Honestly have to take a break from league, I don't have time for a 20-30 minute queue penalty wait before a 40m game. Thanks for the response though.

If the client is freezing up in champion select, there's a good chance that something is going on between your network and our servers. it doesn't mean your own connection is bad, but there may just be some adjustments here and there we can make to smooth things out a bit. Make sure to go through [**these steps**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to cover all your bases, and hit me back up if that doesn't help!
